title: Kiwi
lyrics:
8 ContributorsKiwi Lyrics[Verse 1]
Wind the pushing through the trees
Like I like that
I've been talking all night in my sleep
With the sheets wrapped
The hustle-bustle rustle of the breeze
Like I like that
And I just wanted you to stay and see
That I really care

[Pre-Chorus]
I'm lonely
Now I'm not
I'm cozy

[Chorus]
A kid kiwi
Mm, I guess I'm not
You say you need me
Well, uh
A kid kiwi
Mm, I guess I'm not
You say you need me
Oh, hell no, uh

[Verse 2]
Too much stress, it leaves me all awake
It's just those things
I just want to drink all day and say
"Is it too late?"
The hustle-bustle rustle of the trees
Lord, Lord knows I like that
I just wanted you to stay and see
That I really care
See Quarters of Change LiveGet tickets as low as $26You might also like[Pre-Chorus]
I'm lonely
Now I'm not
I'm cozy

[Chorus]
A kid kiwi
Mm, I guess I'm not
You say you need me
Well, uh
A kid kiwi
I guess I'm not
You say you need me
Oh, well, uh

[Instrumental Bridge]

[Outro]
I sit in my room at night
Waiting for a fire to light
Kid kiwi knocks on my door
Begging me for some more
These days everything goes so fast
I blink and it's right in my past
I wish I had more lines
I wish we had more time4Embed
